title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring a non-perishable food item for our local food bank.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: This Sunday, July 13th, we have the opportunity to minister to the residents at BVLC. Please come and worship with these dear people at 2:30PM at BVLC.

title: Communion Sunday
description: Join us for Communion Sunday as we remember the sacrifice of Jesus Christ.

title: Clean Up Day
description: The deacons are inviting you to come to a clean up day. Bring your work gloves!

title: Ladies Lunch at the Park
description: During the summer months, let's enjoy the sunshine and fellowship at Lone Rock Park as well as devotion. Bring a sack lunch and a lawn chair.

title: Ladies Lunch at the Park
description: During the summer months, let's enjoy the sunshine and fellowship at Lone Rock Park as well as devotion. Bring a sack lunch and a lawn chair.

title: Vacation Bible School
description: Get ready for adventure in the International Spy Academy! Join us for a week of fun, games, and learning about Jesus. This is a free event for kids ages 5-12. Dinner will be provided each night.

title: Men's Fraternity
description: There will be a re-study of the Engagement Project starting on July 14th at 7AM at Thayne's Prime Cuts in Lolo. Contact Thayne for more information.
